sentence: We arrived just after New Year like most people we could not fault the staff
The variety of water sports is brilliant and Ryan and the rest of his team looked after my siblings and I very well
The entire staff deserve gold stars for making our stay so special
Staff at the hotel were all tremendous
Fantastic ambience and brilliant staff
Great staff friendly very helpful and always smiling
Very generous welcoming by all of your employees
All staff at Royal pavilion are very kind and helpful
The staff are brilliant friendly caring and attentive
Luxurious property with excellent service
My review of the Fairmont Royal Pavilion be divided into sections room restaurant amenities activites customer service and overall summary
Sorry I can not remember names but all the Concierge team were helpful as were most of the Reception staff and all the restaurant staff waiters and managers were always very welcoming
Staff is friendly and food is on time but presentation was tht pretty
All staff were friendly and attentive at all times of the day The pool could perhaps be cleared of leaves etc more often as it ’s surrounded by trees but that ’s a minor quibble
As always we were greeted by old friends although all the senior management staff were new
Besides offering a top location with nice rooms the service and the quality of the restaurant are downgrading the stay too much
Initially the front desk staff tried to pretend the room was indeed what we had booked
The staff in restaurant are fantastic to and are far too many to mention but Pierce who has been there for so long will get a mention as every year he looks after us beautifully
My husband has mobility and speech issues and the hotel staff could n’t do enough to make him feel comfortable
it has all the features of a huge Fairmount property but due to the fact that there are only 72 rooms you feel like its a boutique hotel as their staff take the time to get to know you
Great location but does nt make up for the tired hotel poor food and lack of service
When we arrived all had been serviced with just a group of 4 waiting for their lunch
The only comment I have is that the reception area looks old abd does not give a good first impression of the rest if the hotel
Just feel that the staff lacked identity
The service when we sat at the tables near the bar was poor
We can not thank them and all their competent and kind staff enough

The thinking is that the location and beach will offset everything but we know that guests are staring to question the price and standard and some have gone next door As I say I write this with a heavy heart as we love the staff we have grown to think of as friends and we love the area and of course Barbados itself But the management apathy has started to set in abc unles that attitude changes then we will begins another casualty

The location and the beach is second to none and you would be hard pressed to find anywhere as good in this part of the world or any part of the world for that matter However the stars of the hotel has started to dim anc little indisciplines have crept into the place and it ’s frustrating to see the wonderful long standing staff who pride themselves on customer service suffering due to poor management and what appears slackness in the standards that were such a benchmark for this hotel

Felt like we had to win the staff over which is incredulous as WE were the customersThe service was atrocious first morning asked for Americano coffee rather than the awful filter and was told it was in the store cupboard and could n’t find itAt breakfast the HP sauce was empty asked for replacement and did n’t come for 3 daysAsked for nuts at the bar nothing was ever offered were told no nuts but pulled out a tube of Pringles and chucked them on a plate definitely not a five star hotel
did n’t complain while we were there as there did n’t look to be anyone in charge at all and the staff all looked completely unhappy in their work
So disappointed in our experience at the Fairmont was n’t particularly greeted with a warm welcome and girl behind reception looked miserable
The staff at the bar grill and the restaurants were slow and not attentive
